attributes.title: this app gave me constipation
attributes.review: i decided to download this app because of how AMAZING people were telling me it was. however after downloading it my stomach started to rumble and tumble. i dismissed it and decided to blame it on having a bad lunch. however whenever i exited out of the app it went away. after a few times of this occurring i decided that this was strange. every time i would go to the bathroom i would go on this app and read about all of the GrEaT things that our great supreme cheeto leader is doing for our country. however my poop just wouldnâ€™t come out. i was rushed to the emergency room where they told me that my brain was turning orange and said the only cure was by deleting this app. i felt 1000 times better after deleting the app. 10/10 WOULD NOT recommend. all this technology is rotting our brains and we mustnâ€™t let that happen. attributes.review: this app is the WORST!!!!!!! it took weeks to download and is selling all my data to big tech companies. not only that, but the app tried to revoke my 14th amendment rights and is constantly dog whistling!!!!! there are kids in cages, a pandemic w (as of 7/8/2020: 3.08M cases and 134K deaths) and a lack of federal response, the rise in hate crimes and white supremacy, the increased wealth disparity, the exploitation of the working class, the increase in prices of essential drugs like insulin, the lack of affordable and quality healthcare, the increase in natural disasters getting worse and worse each year as a result of climate change, the lack of accountability in police departments across the country, the increase in white supremacists in those police departments, the lack of accountability in people committing sexual assault harassment, just to name a few. i seriously question the actual benefits that apple gets by having this app on here!!!! we need to get rid of trump and pence altogether !!!!
